entities.name: Monthly Active Users
entities.summary: Monthly active users (MAU) track unique engaged users and highlight engagement health across product cohorts.

entities.name: Conversion Rate
entities.summary: Conversion rate represents the share of users who complete a target action out of total visitors for a given period.

entities.name: Kolibri Analytics Playbook
entities.summary: Kolibri's analytics playbook recommends pairing MAU trends with conversion funnels to identify retention breakpoints.

entities.name: Product Manager Persona
entities.summary: Product managers monitor MAU, conversion, and feature adoption to prioritise roadmap investments.

entities.name: Kolibri Energy-Aware Mode
entities.summary: Energy-aware mode allocates compute dynamically, preferring symbolic rules and activating neural reasoning only when signal quality requires it.

relations.description: MAU shifts often precede conversion changes; track cohorts to explain funnel drop-offs.
Playbook chapter 2 outlines MAU instrumentation and interpretation.
Conversion audit checklist pairs retention and activation signals.
Persona relies on analytics guidance to frame discovery interviews.
Playbook references energy-aware routing when recommending instrumentation dashboards.
